name: Send WhatsApp Button Message
description: Sends an interactive button message via WhatsApp Cloud API

phone_number_variable.label: Phone Number
phone_number_variable.description: Select a variable from previous node containing phone number(s). Use format {{node_id.field}} or {{trigger_data.field}}. Can be a single number or array of numbers.

phone_numbers.label: Phone Numbers (Alternative)
phone_numbers.description: Array of phone numbers to send to (with country code, e.g., ['8801345318757', '+1234567890']). This takes precedence over the variable input.

header_text.label: Header Text
header_text.description: Optional header text for the message

footer_text.label: Footer Text
footer_text.description: Optional footer text for the message

buttons.label: Buttons
buttons.description: Array of button objects. Each button should have: id, title, type (reply). Maximum 3 buttons.
